# Cavern (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* | [[Callarduran Smoothhands]], [[Dumathoin]], Geb, Ghaunadaur, Grumbar, [[Gruumsh]], [[Luthic]], Segojan Earthcaller, Shar |

**Granted Powers:** You gain the stonecunning ability. If you already have stonecunning, your racial bonus on checks to notice unusual stonework increases to +4.

**Cavern Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Detect Secret Doors (Spell)|Detect Secret Doors]]****:** Reveals hidden doors within 60 ft.

**2** **[[Darkness (Spell)|Darkness]]****:** 20-ft. radius of supernatural shadow.

**3** **[[Meld Into Stone (Spell)|Meld into Stone]]****:** You and your gear merge with stone.

**4** **[[Secure Shelter (Spell)|Secure Shelter]]****:** Creates sturdy cottage.

**5** **[[Passwall (Spell)|Passwall]]****:** Creates passage through wood or stone wall.

**6** **[[Find the Path (Spell)|Find the Path]]****:** Shows most direct way to a location.

**7 [[Maw of Stone (Spell)|Maw of Stone]]:** Animates cavern opening or chamber.

**8** **[[Earthquake (Spell)|Earthquake]]****:** Intense tremor shakes 5-ft./level radius.

**9** **[[Imprisonment (Spell)|Imprisonment]]****:** Entombs subject beneath the earth.
